structure.unit: OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH OF EMPLOYEES

law.history: Repealed 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 251, sec. 22. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2741k-5, 2741k-7.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Inspectors of scaffolding in cities of the first and second classes.
